name: Protein Cookie Dough Bark
description: No-Bake Protein Cookie Dough with Chocolate Ganache
instructions: Combine the almond flour, protein powder, cashew butter, maple syrup, melted coconut oil, and vanilla extract; mix until smooth
Fold in the mini chocolate chips
Press the dough flat onto a baking sheet lined with parchment paper
Melt the dark chocolate chips, peanut butter, and coconut oil together until smooth
Pour and spread the chocolate mixture over the cookie dough layer
Refrigerate for 2 hours, or freeze for at least 45 minutes to set
